testcase.name: Opening a webpage using Selenium
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Google Home Page...........................................passed When User types in Cheese and hits ENTER....................................passed Then Show how many search results were shown................................passed And Close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Testing Login
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login page.................................................passed When User enters username and password......................................passed Then Read the page title and confirmation message...........................passed And Close the Browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Testing with Data from Scenario

testcase.name: Basic test for Selenium
